name: RideOp - VR Thrill Ride Experience
description: Leave your fear of heights outside and get ready to experience thrills like never before. RideOp – VR Thrill Ride Experience brings you the ultimate ride experience. Explore an immersive 360 degree view while riding some of the world’s most impressive attractions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 Bit or higher Processor: Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 5750 1Gb VRAM / Intel HD4400 / NVidia Geforce 640 1Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 Bit or higher Processor: Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X 2Gb VRAM / Intel HD4400 / NVIDIA 760 series 2Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
